## How to Claim Crash Bonus Codes

### Step-by-Step Guide:

1. **Choose a casino from our verified list** (all tested for fair games)
2. **Click the affiliate link** (ensures you get the bonus)
3. **Create your account** (use real info — you'll need to verify later)
4. **Go to “Bonuses” or “Promotions”** section
5. **Enter the bonus code** (or it's auto-applied via our link)
6. **Make your qualifying deposit**
7. **Bonus is credited instantly**

**Pro tip:** Read the terms before depositing. Look for:
– Wagering requirements (lower is better)
– Game restrictions (crash games should count 100%)
– Max bet limits while wagering
– Expiration dates

—

## Bonus Terms Explained

### Wagering Requirements

This is how many times you must play through the bonus before withdrawing.

**Example:**
– Bonus: €100
– Wagering: 40x
– You must bet: €100 × 40 = €4,000 total
– Then you can withdraw your winnings

**What counts toward wagering?**
– Crash games: Usually 100% (full contribution)
– Slots: Usually 100%
– Table games: Usually 10-50%

### Minimum Deposit

The smallest amount you can deposit to qualify for the bonus.
– Typical: €10-€20
– Some casinos accept smaller deposits with crypto

### Maximum Cashout

Some bonuses limit how much you can withdraw from bonus winnings.
– Look for: “Unlimited” or no max cashout
– Avoid bonuses with low max cashouts (e.g., “max €100 from €500 bonus”)

### Game Restrictions

Make sure crash games count 100% toward wagering. Some bonuses exclude certain games.

—

—

## Red Flags to Avoid

### ❌ Fake Bonus Codes

These sites list “exclusive” codes that don't actually work:
– Generic casino directories (they don't test codes)
– Forums with outdated info (codes from 2024)
– “Affiliate spam” sites (any code for commission)

### ❌ Unrealistic Wagering

Avoid bonuses with:
– **70x+ wagering** (nearly impossible to clear)
– **7-day expiration** (not enough time)
– **Max bet €1** (takes forever to clear)

### ❌ Hidden Terms

Watch out for:
– Game restrictions (crash excluded)
– Deposit method restrictions (Skrill/Neteller don't qualify)
– Country restrictions (your country excluded)

—

## Crash Bonus Strategy

### How to Maximize Bonus Value:

1. **Choose low wagering** (35-40x is standard, avoid 50x+)
2. **Check game contributions** (crash should count 100%)
3. **Calculate expected value:**
– Bonus €100, wagering 40x = €4,000 total bets
– House edge 3% = €120 expected loss
– EV = €100 – €120 = -€20
– Is it worth it? Only if you'll play anyway

4. **Don't chase losses** — bonuses aren't free money
5. **Read the fine print** — always check terms before depositing

### Pro Tip: Bonus Stacking

Some casinos let you claim:
1. Welcome bonus (first deposit)
2. Reload bonus (second deposit)
3. Free spins (third deposit)

Stack these for maximum value — but only if you were planning to deposit anyway.

—

## How We Maintain This List

**Daily checks:**
– Verify codes are still active
– Test new bonus offers
– Remove expired promotions
– Update last-verified dates

**Monthly reviews:**
– Re-test each casino's bonus terms
– Update wagering requirements if changed
– Remove casinos that reduced bonus value
– Add new crash-friendly casinos

**Transparency:**
– We never recommend casinos we haven't tested
– We disclose wagering requirements honestly
– We update when bonuses change
– We remove expired codes immediately

—

## Quick FAQ

**Q: Do these codes expire?**
A: Yes, usually monthly. We update on the 1st of each month.

**Q: Can I use multiple codes?**
A: Usually one per deposit. Some casinos allow stacking first 3 deposits.

**Q: What if a code doesn't work?**
A: Contact support — they'll manually credit you. Or message us and we'll investigate.

**Q: Are these codes unique?**
A: Most codes are public. Some casinos offer exclusive codes for better bonuses.

**Q: Do I need a code at all?**
A: Many casinos auto-apply bonuses via our affiliate links. Check the “No code needed” column.

—

## Last Updated: February 2, 2026

Bookmark this page — we update codes daily. For crash gambling strategy and beginner guides, explore our [Crash Gambling 101](#) article.

**Reminder:** Bonuses are for entertainment, not profit. Only deposit what you can afford to lose. If you need help, visit [GamCare](https://www.gamcare.org.uk/) or [Gamblers Anonymous](https://www.gamblersanonymous.org/).

—

*Verified by crashgamegambling.com | Updated daily*
